alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 22 at 4:31PM EDT until July 22 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following county, Leon. * WHEN...Until 530 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tallahassee, Doak Campbell Stadium, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Mission San Luis, Levy Park, Innovation Park, Tallahassee Mall, Leon County Civic Center, Kleman Plaza, Lake Ella, Bragg Stadium, State Capital Complex, Springsax Park, Macon Community Park, Winthrop Park, Lake Bradford, Gaither Community Center and Tallahassee Memorial Hosp. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
